page.title: 15A Day in Nicholas's Life
page.content: On Sunday morning my dad woke my brother Adam early because they were going fishing. Mum got up next and made breakfast for the rest of the family. She called us to get washed and dressed. My eldest brother rushed his breakfast as he was going to work but my big sister stayed in bed beause she is lazy. After our meal we went out to play. My twin sister went for a bicycle ride and mum prepared lunch. Dad came home at lunch-time,he and Adam had caught seventeen fish. Later we had to put our shoes and coats on and travel by car to Warrington. My brother Jason Had phoned to say his motor-bike had broken down and we went to bring him home. It was tea-time when we returned. After tea we watched television for a while. At 8:30pm I went to bed.
